part.desc: Define la vista basada en el resultado de la consulta SELECT siguiente.
Une con tabla de dimensiones de fecha.
Agrega los resultados por a침o, mes y regi칩n.

command.full: CREATE VIEW vSalesByRegion AS SELECT d.[Year] AS CalendarYear, c.CountryRegion AS SalesRegion, SUM(so.SalesTotal) AS SalesRevenue FROM FactSalesOrder AS so JOIN DimDate AS d ON so.SalesOrderDateKey = d.DateKey JOIN DimCustomer AS c ON so.CustomerKey = c.CustomerKey GROUP BY d.[Year], d.[Month], d.MonthName, c.CountryRegion;
